Pour faire le fonio précuit, on le lave proprement avec de l’eau pure, l’étuve, l’assèche dans le séchoir et l’emballe dans les sachets plastiques.   La revente se fait au comptant ou à crédit en ambulant et parfois par commande à une clientèle composée majoritairement  de femmes. Madame Coumba compte  réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 100 000 FCFA par mois, qui sera utilisé, pour assurer les soins de santé des enfants.
texts.en:
The four members of the Benkan group are all married and living in monogamous households. They average 42 years of age with four children each, and they all live in the Sirakoro Doufing district of the III municipality in Bamako (Mali's capital). They got to know each other through relatives, neighbors and their income-generating activities. The group members sells plastic shoes, pre-cooked fonio and millet flour. They turned to Soro Yiriwaso so that they could build up their stocks, and they are on their second group loan.

Coumba (who is standing on the far right of the photo) is a great vendor of pre-cooked fonio and millet flour. She is planning to use her loan to buy five sacks of millet and three sacks of fonio. She gets her supplies of cereals from the market in Medine. In order to prepare the pre-cooked fonio, it is washed with pure water, steamed and dried in a dryer, and then it is packed up in plastic bags. She resells for cash and on credit on a door-to-door basis and sometimes to order to a customer base made up primarily of women. With this loan Coumba is planning to make an average monthly profit of 100,000FCFA, which will be used to cover her children's healthcare.

loans.use: to buy cereals.

loans.name: Oisha

texts.ru: Оиша женщина в возрасте. Ей 51 год. Она мать пятерых детей. Ее муж работает учителем в местной школе. У Оиши большая, но дружная семья. В их семье живут 8 человек. Оиша любит и ценит свою семью. Она хочет улучшить благополучие семьи. Для этого она собирается открыть собственное дело. Оиша имеет способности к шитью и теперь хочет использовать это свое умение на деле. Чтобы приобрести вышивальную машинку, Оише не хватает собственных средств. Для этой цели она берет кредит. Оиша с помощью кредита хочет начать свое дело и принести дополнительный источник дохода в свою семью.
texts.en:
Oisha is a woman of 51 and the mother of five children. Her husband works as a teacher in the local school. Oisha has a large but happy family which she loves and values. There are eight of them in all. She wants to improve the family's well-being and so is preparing to start her own business. She knows how to sew and wants to use her skills in her business. 

Oisha doesn't have enough money to buy a sewing machine, so she wants to take out a loan to cover the costs. With the help of this loan she will be able to start her business and have another source of income for her family.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine to start her new business

loans.name: Merian

texts.en: Merian is married and has a motorcycle transportation business in the Philippines. She works hard to support her family, and has requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle. Merian has been in this business for 5 years now. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle

loans.name: Dina Esther

texts.es:
Dina de 30 años de edad. El esposo se dedica a la construcción fuera del país,  en esta relación han procreado 3 hijos, uno de ellos está en la escuela; Dina viven sus 3 hijos y su mamá.  

Dina se dedica a la sastrería desde ya hace 2 años,  este trabajo lo aprendió en un curso cuando salió de estudiar, fue aprendiendo este oficio y así se ha quedado haciendo trabajitos a los amigos o amigas; pero también ella ha aprendido a hacer trabajos de croché esto lo hace sola ya que lo hace en la casa.


El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar 12 pliegos de lámina,  6 polines y buscar la persona quien le repare la cochera, ya que de un fuerte viento se le cayeron unas láminas que tenía esto le ayudara mucho, ya que preparara su casa poco a poco porque ahí juegan los niños y eso le perjudica.  

Los sueños que tiene es con la ayuda de Dios pueda instalar un taller de sastre y enseñarle a las personas que estén interesados en aprender, ya que es una fuente de ingresos que las personas tienen y así le pagaran a ella y tendrá ese ingreso para su familia y sus hijos tendrán mejores condiciones,  esto lo lograra con mucho esfuerzo.
texts.en:
Dina is 30 years old and her husband is doing construction work outside the country. They have 3 children, one of whom is in school. Dina lives with her 3 children and her mother.

Dina has been a seamstress for two years now. She learned the skill from a course she took after finishing school. She has been practicing this skill and, now, she does small jobs for her friends, male and female. In addition, she has also learned to crochet. She does this work in her own home.

The loan Dina is requesting is for purchasing 12 sheets of steel and 6 rafters, and to hire someone to rebuild the garage, which collapsed in a strong wind. Having these repairs done would be of much help, since she is repairing her house so that her children can play there safely. 

Dina's dreams are, with God's help, to be able to install a tailor shop and to teach others who are willing to learn. This is a source of income for her family and her children will have better living conditions. She hopes to achieve this with much effort.

loans.use: buy 12 sheets of steel,  6 rafters, and to pay someone to repair the garage, which collapsed in a strong wind.

loans.name: María Dolores

texts.es:
María de 31 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato. Su esposo se dedica a motorista de un vehículo que hace viajes a la comunidad, han procreado dos hijos, los cuales uno de ellos está en la escuela y el otro pasa con ella en casa. María vive con sus dos hijos, su esposo y la suegra.

María se dedica al comercio tienen  una pequeña tienda y un molino desde hace  4 años; este negocio lo aprendió sola ya que en la comunidad no había molino entonces ella decido con el esposo ponerlo y le ha donde un gran resultado, ya que están en el centro de un caserío a la entrada del cantón donde hay mucha gente que lo visitan y debido a eso abrió la tienda para que la gente que vaya a moler pueda adquirir su productos. Ella muele en dos jornadas en un horario de las 8:00 am a las 1:00 am y de las 3:00 p.m a 5:00 pm 

El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar unos repuestos del molino;  ya que el  esposo va fuera del país y ahorita es el único ingreso que le da para mantener los hijos;  pero también con lo que le sobre comprara más golosinas y productos de la canasta básica,  ya que es lo que más se vende en la tienda. El crédito va a ayudarle mucho ya que tendrá mas surtida la tienda y el molino va a funcionar mejor y también va a comprar un quintal de abono para el cultivo de café que tiene.

Los sueños que tiene  es que su esposo llegue a su destino,  que el molino siempre este en buenas condiciones para el sostén de la familia y que sus hijos no les falte nada, que tengan todo lo necesario ya sea para su casa o la escuela y que la finca que están cultivando sea de muy buen provecho para que en un futuro tengan ganancias de la venta de café.
texts.en:
María, 31 years old, studied through high school. Her husband drives a vehicle that makes trips in the community. They have two children, one of whom is in school; the other is with her at home. María lives with her two children, her husband, and her mother-in-law.

María works in business. For 4 years, they have had a small store and a mill. She learned this business by herself. Since there was no mill in the community, she and her husband decided to put one in, and they have had great results, since they are in the middle of a village at the entrance to the canton where many people visit. Because of this she opened the store so the people who come to mill can buy their products. She mills two days a week on a schedule from 8:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. and from 3:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m.

The loan she is requesting is to buy some spare parts for the mill, since her husband is going out of the country and right now it is the only income she has to support the children. Also, with what she has left over she will buy more sweets and staple goods, since that is what sells the most in the store. The loan is going to help her a lot since the store will be better-stocked and the mill will work better. She is also going to buy a quintal [46 kg] of manure for the coffee crop she has.

Her dreams are for her husband to reach his destination, for the mill to always be in good condition to support the family, and for her children not to lack anything, that they have everything they need, be it for home or school, and for the land she is cultivating to be of very great benefit to them so that in the future they will have income from selling coffee.

loans.use: to buy some spare parts for the mill, sweets, staple goods, and manure for the coffee crop

loans.name: Alles

texts.en:
Alles, age 59, is a responsible mother living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She belongs to a poor family, and it is very difficult for her to meet all the household expenses on a low income. In fact, her son owns a scrap shop and deals with recycling material such as scrap iron, aluminum, plastic bottles, etc. He has been running this business for many years from his shop situated near his home. 

Now he got a huge contract to buy useless iron, aluminum, copper, plastic accessories, etc, but he does not have sufficient cash in hand to show his consent to the dealer. Therefore, Alles has requested a loan for her son, so he can buy the recycling material and establish his enterprise and make some savings to meet sudden needs or incidents. 

Alles is very impressed with this honorable support and expresses her wish to take a huge loan after this one. She thanks Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy recycling material to resell

loans.name: Sayrambi

texts.ru: Сайрамби местная жительница района Хамадони, которая занимается животноводством. Ее муж работает в государственной энергетической компании района. Один сын таксист, а другой сын находится в России в качестве трудового мигранта. Сайрамби продолжает свой бизнес откорм-продажу скотов в течение 10 лет. Она научилась этому делу самостоятельно. Муж тоже помогает в ее бизнесе. Сайрамби хочет увеличить прибыльность бизнеса, а для этого ей нужно увеличить поголовье скота. С такой целью она обратилась за кредитом и надеется на поддержку.
texts.en: Sayrambi is a local resident of the Hamadoni district, involved in animal husbandry. Her husband works at a state-owned energy company in the district. One of her sons is a taxi driver, and the other is a migrant worker in Russia. Sayrambi has been running her business of fattening up and selling livestock for 10 years. She learned this business independently. Her husband also helps her in the business. Sayrambi wants to increase her business profitability and needs to increase livestock headcount for this. She requested this loan to achieve this goal and hopes for the support.

loans.use: to buy cattle in order to expand her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy an air compressor for his business and in this way be able to work more efficiently in his glass shop

loans.name: Damira

texts.ru: Дамире 57 лет, вдова, мать 2 детей. У Дамиры среднее образование, с 2004 года занимается торговлей галантерейных изделий, канцелярских товаров,  спортивных сумок, чемоданов и т.д. на местном рынке. Стартовав с 10,000 сом (KGS), на сегодняшний день у Дамиры уже наработана постоянная клиентура, ее ежемесячный доход составляет в среднем 25,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Дамира обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение ассортимента товаров в ее торговом павильоне. А именно Дамира планирует приобрести канцелярские товары перед началом учебного года. Доходы от кредита Дамира планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса, что позволит в будущем расширить ее павильон и сделать ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Damira is 57, a widow and the mother of two children. She has a high school education and has been selling stationery, bags and suitcases and other goods in the local market since 2004, a business she started with 10,000 KGS. She has earned a regular clientele and now has a monthly income of about 25,000 KGS.

With the goal of further developing her business, Damira has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 KGS to increase her inventory in her shop. Specifically, she wants to buy stationery before the start of the school year. She plans to invest profits from the loan into further developing her business, which will allow her in the future to expand her shop and renovate her house.

loans.use: to increase her assortment of stationery before the start of the school year in order to be more profitable and competitive

loans.name: Hayrullo

texts.en:
Hayrullo is a hardworking man. He is married and has three children. Hayrullo lives with his family in a rural area. His parents also live with him. Hayrullo has been busy with growing agriculture produce as rice, tomatoes, paprika, etc. Hayrullo sells his harvest in a local market. He also has additional income from animal husbandry. 

Hayrullo needs financial support because his mother is ill. He is asking for a loan of 3500 somoni to buy medicines for treatment of his mother. They await your mercy.

loans.use: To buy medicines for treatment of his mother

loans.name: Wesley

texts.en:
Five years ago, Wesley, 33 years of age, started practicing mixed farming in a small piece of inherited land in his rural town of Litein. Today, he boasts of the great strides he has made in dairy farming. This ambitious father of three earns his livelihood through selling milk, eggs and tea produced from his farm. He also does a transportation business with his motorbike to make extra income. 

Although he makes profits from dairy farming, he is faced with challenges that might put him down. Cows in his farm are affected by harsh weather conditions hence they become sick, and also he faces challenges of properly feeding and milking his cows. He is seeking a loan to build a modern dairy unit. Cows require a proper resting place and proper food so that they can produce the maximum amount of milk. Without a proper dairy unit cows will be affected with diseases and also they will not have a good place to rest and feed hence low production of milk. 

Wesley feels relieved knowing that there are partners such as Kiva lenders who assist aspiring men such as himself to achieve their dreams. With your loan Wesley is  going to change his life permanently, and increased income from high milk production will be used in paying back  the loan fully and improving his living standard.

loans.use: To construct a dairy unit

loans.name: Jacinta

texts.en:
Jacinta is applying for a loan of 800 USD from TRM (TubaRaiMetin). She is 38 years old. She runs a kiosk in front of her house, and she will use the loan to buy stock to keep in her store such as eggs, beer, coffee, sugar, salt, milk, noodles, slippers and water. She makes good money from selling and she wants to apply for bigger loan in the future. 

Jacinta lives near the school in her town. Her kiosk is located in a strategic place where many people come to buy, including students.

loans.use: To buy eggs, beer, coffee, sugar, salt, milk, noodles, slippers and water

loans.name: Rohatoy

texts.ru:
Эту уроженку района Кубадиён зовут Рохатой. Ей 50 лет. Она трудолюбивая и честная женщина, зарабатывающая на жизнь собственным трудом. Рохатой занимается животноводством и растениеводством. Вся ее семья - муж и дети заняты в этих сферах. У ее мужа имеется большой участок земли, на котором они сеют огородные и бахчевые культуры, а также люцерну и жмых для своих скотов.
Рохатой начала бизнес откорм и продажу скотов два года назад. Сейчас в ее хозяйстве имеются одна дойная корова для нужд семьи и два быка для откорма и продажи. Рохатой берет кредит для купли еще одного бычка с целью развития своего бизнеса. Она надеется на вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
This resident of the Qubadiyon region is called Rohatoy. She is 50 and a hardworking and honest woman who earns a living through her own effort. Rohatoy works in animal husbandry and agriculture. All of her family - her husband and children - work in this area too. Her husband has a large piece of land on which they grow vegetables and melons as well as lucerne and oilcake for cattle feed.

Rohatoy started a business fattening and selling cattle two years ago. She now has one milking cow for her family's needs and two bulls for fattening and sale. She wants a loan to buy one more steer with the goal of developing her business. She hopes for your support.

loans.use: to buy a small steer to develop her business

loans.name: Gulandom

texts.ru:
Эту 27-летнюю молодую женщину зовут Гуландом. Она из района Хамадони. Гуландом уже замужем и имеет 2-летнюю дочку. Ее муж уехал в дальнюю страну, чтобы зарабатывать и обеспечивать свою семью. И Гуландом вынуждена была смириться с этим.
После рождения дочки Гуландом решила открыть свое дело. Она научилась профессии швеи и уже два года как у себя дома берет заказ на пошив женских одеяний. У нее очень хорошо получается и поэтому количество ее клиентов увеличивается. Гуландом хочет обновить свой швейную машинку. Она просит кредит в размере 1000 долларов США, чтобы приобрести модернизированную швейную машинку. Это поможет ей расширить ее деятельность.
texts.en:
The name of this 27-year-old young woman is Gulandom. She is from the Hamadoni district. Gulandom is already married and has a 2-year-old daughter. Her husband went to a distant country to earn a living and provide for his family. And Gulandom had to accept this.

Gulandom decided to start her own business after the birth of her daughter. She learned the seamstress profession and has been accepting orders at home for sewing women's clothing for two years. She does this well, and this is why the number of her clients continues to increase. Gulandom wants to update her sewing machine. She is requesting a loan in the amount of 1000 US dollars to purchase a modern sewing machine. This will help her expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase a modern sewing machine

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en: Jennifer is 38 years old, married and blessed with three children. She engages in buying and reselling fruit and vegetables to earn an income. She aims to improve the business and make it profitable in order to earn a higher income. Due to insufficient capital, she would like to access a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy more tomatoes, beans, ginger and oranges to resell. A diligent mother, she believes that she will further improve the business through this financial assistance.

loans.use: to buy more tomatoes, beans, ginger and oranges to resell

location.town: Brgy. Bone South, Aritao, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Muhammad Jamal

texts.en: M. Jamal owns a garment factory in Karachi. He is hardworking and has been running this garment factory for 12 years now. He is married and has five children. He purchases required materials like fabric, thread, etc. from the local market to manufacture garments for selling purposes. He has established himself in the local market and gets frequent orders to manufacture different varieties of garments. Currently he needs to buy raw materials to make suits for which he needs money. He has requested a loan to help him in buying necessary stock and manufacturing it in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy more raw materials to manufacture garments in his garment factory

loans.name: Benkadi  1 Group

texts.fr:
Les 10 membres du groupe  BENKADI 1 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 43 ans, 4 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles traditionnelles à KONDA, un des villages de la commune de TENE cercle de TOMINIAN  de la  4ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur 5ème prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est : l’ arachide  avec  MASSARAN ,  femme assise au milieu  sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, des semences, des petits matériels agricoles et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir : 2 hectares. 
La production sera vendue au niveau du village et à TENE, après la récolte, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 45 000FCFA en fin de campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The ten members of the group BENKADI 1 are married women, who average 43 years of age and four children each, all living in traditional families in KONDA, a village in Commune de TENE, Cercle de TOMINIAN (4th administrative region of the Republic of Mali). The women are collaborating with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to carry out their farm work during the rainy season. They are on their fifth loan with the institution. The past loans were indeed paid back. 

The crop grown is: peanuts, as is the case with MASSARAN (the woman sitting in the middle in the photo). With her loan, she intends to purchase farm inputs, seeds, and tools and to pay for plowing to maintain: 2  hectares. 

After harvest, the produce is sold to a customer base composed of men and women the village and in TENE. She envisions making an average profit of 45,000 francs CFA per planting. This profit will enable her to pay back her loan and also to help out her husband in covering day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to pay for plowing, farm inputs, tools, and seeds

loans.name: Sokkhim

texts.en:
Sokkhim, 42 year old, is an active farmer who lives in a rural area of Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. He has four dependent children who are enrolled in the local school. To make a living and support his family, Sokkhim manages and operates a farming business on a small plot located near his house. On his farmland, he grows rice and sells his agricultural product to the local dealers. So far, he has been involved in this career for around 20 years. 

Sokkhim would like to keep his rice growing well by using natural fertilizers on his farmland. Due to a lack of money, he has applied for a loan to buy fertilizers to use in his farming process. With the support from this loan, he hopes his rice will grow well and bring him more crops. He would like to thank all lenders for their financial support for poor people.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers

loans.name: Felicidad

texts.en: Felicidad is 51 years old and has three children. Due to unavoidable circumstances, she was separated from her husband. Despite this, she has the determination to uplift her family's standard of living and give them a better life. She buys and resells fruits and vegetables within the local community. To improve her business, she would like to access financial assistance from KIVA lenders in the amount of PHP 14,000 in order to  buy more fruits and vegetables to sell. Having patience and strong determination, she believes someday she will become financially stable.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell

location.town: Brgy. Bone South, Aritao, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Mahraby

texts.ru: Махраби жизнерадостная и трудолюбивая женщина. Она занимается предоставлением услуги швеи. Махраби предоставляет свои услуги уже более 4 года. Она работает упорно, чтобы прокормить своего одного маленького ребенка. Ее муж мастер по ремонту дома, но он не имеет постоянное место работы и поэтому они живут крайне бедно. Махраби шьёт платья с раннего утра до позднего вечера, чтобы удовлетворить своих клиентов и терять их. Она единственная кормилица семьи. Ее муж хочет уехать в Российскую Федерацию с целью нахождения работы и улучшения уровень жизни. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для покупки авиабилета для своего мужа. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Mahraby is a cheerful and hardworking woman who has been working as a seamstress for more than four years. She works constantly in order to feed her only child. Her husband is a tradesman who does home renovations, but he doesn't have a steady place of work and therefore their living situation is precarious. Mahraby sews dresses from early morning to late evening in order to meet demand for her clients. She is the only breadwinner in the family. Her husband wants to go to Russia to find work and improve their quality of life. She is requesting a loan of 2,000 somoni to buy a plane ticket for him. She awaits your kindness and hopes for your charity.

loans.use: to buy a plane ticket so her husband can travel to Russia to find work

loans.name: Efren

texts.en: Efren is 65 years old and married with nine children. He works very hard to provide for them. He runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock like sardines, noodles, coffee, etc. to sell. Efren has been in this business for 8 years. In the future he would like to save money to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock to sell

loans.name: Dilorom

texts.ru: Дилором добрая женщина. Ей 64 года. Она замужем и имеет 4 детей. Некоторые из них совершеннолетние, а некоторые из них несовершеннолетние. Муж Дилорома работает экономистом. Сама Дилором занимается выращиванием сельхоз культур и продажей сельхоз культур на местном рынке. Она этим бизнесом занимается уже более 20 лет. Дилором имеет дополнительный доход от скотоводства. Она всегда мечтала, чтобы ее дети получили высшее образование. Ее дочь учится в университете. Дилором должна оплатить за ее учебный договор, но не имеет денег. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 500 долларов США для оплаты учебного договора своей дочери. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Dilorom is a kind woman of 64. She is married and has four children, some of whom are adults. Dilorom's husband works as an economist, and she grows crops and sells the produce at the local market, a business she has had for more than 20 years. She earns additional income through animal husbandry.

Dilorom has always dreamed that her children would get a higher education. Her daughter is studying at university and she needs to pay her tuition, but doesn't have enough money. She is requesting a loan of $500 USD to cover her daughter's education costs. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to pay her daughter's university tuition

loans.name: Nargiza

texts.ru: Наргиза милая добрая женщина из района Кубадиён. Она в возрасте 21 года уже замужем и имеет одного маленького ребенка. Наргиза со своей семьей живет в доме родителей мужа. Ее муж фермер. Он арендует участок земли, на котором выращивает огородные культуры, а также жмых и люцерну. Поэтому Наргизе не приходиться покупать корм для скотов, так как она берет его со своих земельных участков. Наргиза начала свой животноводческий бизнес два года назад. Ей усердно помогают свёкор и муж. Сейчас для продолжения деятельности ей необходимо закупить скот. Поэтому она в надежде за поддержкой обратилась за кредитом. Наргиза верит, что ее нужда будет услышана и ей окажут финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Nargiza is a kind and good woman from the Qubadiyon region. She is 21 and married with one small child. Nargiza and her family live with her husband's parents. Her husband is a farmer who rents land on which he grows market crops as well as oilcake and lucerne for animal feed. Therefore Nargiza doesn't have to buy cattle feed, since she harvests it from their land.

Nargiza started her animal husbandry business two years ago. Her husband and father-in-law help her with it. Now, in order to continue the business, she needs to buy cattle. For this reason she is requesting a loan in hopes of getting support. She believes that her need will be heard and she will get financial support.

loans.use: to buy cattle to increase her head count of livestock

loans.name: Leang

texts.en:
From Prey Chhor District, Kampong Cham Province, Leang, 43, is an experienced and active farmer. By operating a farming business on a small rice field, she can earn around USD 5 a day to support her family daily expenses. She is a lovely mother of five dependent children who are enrolled in the local school and one married child.

To accelerate her farming operation, Leang would like to hire some laborers to help her with the plowing process. Due to her shortage of money, she would like to get a KIVA loan to pay for the laborers' hiring fees. With the support form this loan, she hopes that she will be able to spend a shorter time and less energy on her plowing process and could harvest soon, also. She also thanks all the lenders for their generous behavior.

loans.use: to pay for the laborers' hiring fees

loans.name: Benkadi 3 Group

texts.fr:
Les 8 membres du groupe  BENKADI 3 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 32 ans, 3 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles traditionnelles à KONDA, un des villages de la commune de TENE cercle de TOMINIAN  de la  4ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur 5ème prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est : l’ arachide  avec KAYATA , 2ème  femme assise de la droite vers la gauche  sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, des semences, des petits matériels agricoles et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir : 1 hectare. 
La production sera vendue au niveau du village et à TENE, après la récolte, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 22 000FCFA en fin de campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The eight members of the group BENKADI 3 are married women, who average 32 years of age and three children each, all living in traditional families in KONDA, a village in Commune de TENE, Cercle de TOMINIAN (4th administrative region of the Republic of Mali). The women are collaborating with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to carry out their farm work during the rainy season. They are on their fifth loan with the institution. The past loans were indeed paid back. 

The crop grown is: peanuts, as is the case with KAYATA (the woman sitting second from the right in the photo). With her loan, she intends to purchase farm inputs, seeds, and tools and to pay for plowing to maintain:  1 hectare. 

After harvest, the produce is sold to a customer base composed of men and women the village and in TENE. She envisions making an average profit of 22,000 francs CFA per planting. This profit will enable her to pay back her loan and also to help out her husband in covering day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to pay for plowing, farm inputs, tools, and seeds

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to maintain his car.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fattening calves

loans.name: Luisa

texts.en:
An $800 loan is offered to Luisa to improve her business. Luisa opened her kiosk in 2011 with her own working capital of $300. She will use the loan to buy stock to keep in her store like  'body loosen', cigarettes, sugar and coffee. She is generating a good income from selling.

She has been thinking of running a big business after years of involving herself in doing business. She is living in a town with her family. Her husband is a farmer.

loans.use: To buy 'body-loosen', cigarettes, sugar and coffee

loans.name: Gayane

texts.en:
Gayane lives and works in Yerevan with her husband and son. He is already 10 years old. Gayane and her family run a small cafe, where they produce and sell different types of Armenian dishes. She has applied for this loan because she needs some funds for improving her cafe. The needed loan is important to purchase a refrigerator and oven and pay for a partial renovation of the cafe. 

Gayane has been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products.

loans.use: to pay for a refrigerator, oven and partial renovation of her cafe

loans.name: Sadaf

texts.en:
Sadaf is 26 years old. She is a mother of three children and living in Lahore, Pakistan. 

Her husband has been running a general store in which he sells rice, sugar, cooking oil, detergent, soap, biscuits, etc. He manages to cover their household necessities from his own store; some relatives like to purchase from his general store. Due to good relations, his sales have increased a lot but he does not have sufficient stock to cope with the demand. 

Therefore, Sadaf requested a loan for her husband so that he can buy more stock of wheat, rice, flour, pulses, soaps, shampoo, detergents, biscuits etc. 

Sadaf hopes that her husband will utilize the loan in a positive way; this amount will help him for buying additional inventory. Due to more sales the profit will automatically increase and she would be able to put aside more savings for her family. 

Sadaf is very glad and thanks Kiva and its field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy inventory such as rice, sugar, cooking oil, detergent, soap, biscuits, etc, for  their general store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase iron, cement, sand, and bricks and to be able to pay for labor for a kitchen construction.

loans.name: Marìa Isabel

texts.es:
María Isabel es una mujer que con ayuda de su padre y esposo aprendió a cuidar adecuadamente novillos para engorde, y desde niña ha vivido rodeada de animales para engorde debido a que es una de las únicas opciones de generar ingresos al hogar. Pertenecía a uno de los grupos de Fundación Mujer, anteriormente solicitó un crédito individual por un monto de 600 000 colones; los cuales cancelado puntualmente, aunque el monto que solicito anteriormente no era tan alto como el que va a solicitar actualmente; ya que  requiere esta cantidad para volver a invertir en la compra de novillos para tenerlos en el galerón que construyeron hace dos meses. Tiene 6 años de contar con esta actividad en conjunto con su compañero sentimental. En los últimos años y con la experiencia adquirida han logrado mantenerse  con novillos de diferente peso, al año pueden vender entre 8 y 12 novillos a la Subasta de la zona.
 Doña Isabel compra los novillos con un peso de 350 a 400 kilos para poder venderlos con un peso de 700 a 750 kg a la Subasta de Coto Brus que se realiza todos los jueves. Ella cuenta con 9 hectáreas para que estos animales se alimenten. 
Eligió Fundación Mujer por la buena atención y baja tasa de interés.
texts.en:
Maria Isabel is a woman who, with the help of her father and husband, learned to properly care for and fatten bulls.  Ever since she was a child, she has lived surrounded by animals for fattening, because this was one of the only options to generate income for her household.  Maria Isabel is a member of one of the communal banks working with Fundacion Mujer.  Previously, she requested an individual loan for 600,000 Costa Rican colones, which she paid off on time, although the amount she requested previously was not as large as sum as she is currently requesting.  She needs this larger sum to invest again in her business, buying bulls to keep in the corral that she built 2 months ago.  She and her partner have 6 years of experience in this line of work.  In recent years, with the experience she has acquired keeping bulls of varying weights, she's been able to sell between 8 and 12 bulls a year in the auction in her area.

Isabel will buy bulls between 350 and 400 kilos in weight, so that she can later sell them at a weight between 700-750 kilos in the Coto Brus cattle auction that takes place every Thursday.  She has 9 hectares of land where the cattle can feed.  She chose Fundacion Mujer because of the good service and low interest rates that they provide.

loans.use: to buy bulls
